Summary: object, resembling point of light, moving in rectangular-outline fashion
trends: There have been no other sightings in doyleville
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsSleeping in my van outside our house,woke up in the middle of the night to use restroom outside as was customary. looked up to appreciate stars and saw strange light moving in a rectangular fashion. proceeded to make sure I was not still asleep,unsure of what to think, I watched it for 2 hours or so, mesmerized, and finally went back to bed after it was observed repeating in a rectangular motion over and over.
